name: CyberpunKart 2048
description:
Install instructions

As you go Deeper and Deeper into the Depths of Madness try to avoid falling from your path.

Graphic Options: Escape key

Restart: R key

Jump: Space Key or Gamepad Button A

Accelerate: W or Up Key or Gamepad Left Stick Up

Break: S or Down Key or Gamepad Left Stick Down

Left/Right: A/D or Left/Right Key or Gamepad Left Stick

Music

Fallin
